Supervise M.S. and Ph.D. students and conduct research in robotic design, theoretical kinematics, image processing and pattern recognition, robot trajectory planning, off-line programming, and focus on the applications of geometry based automation, intelligent reverse engineering systems, and multi-freedom motion coordination with vision system.
